amendment.description: Amendment sought to appoint a Special Envoy for Iran to ensure that all diplomatic avenues are pursued to avoid a war with Iran and to prevent Iran from acquiring a nuclear weapon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in House Report 112-485 to appoint a Special Envoy for Iran to ensure that all diplomatic avenues are pursued to avoid a war with Iran and to prevent Iran from acquiring a nuclear weapon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 344 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 344 (Roll no. 285).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
